result.arabic_text: أَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِدُلُوكِ ٱلشَّمۡسِ إِلَىٰ غَسَقِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَقُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡفَجۡرِۖ إِنَّ قُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡفَجۡرِ كَانَ مَشۡهُودٗا
result.translation: 78. Nabiyow! Salat le waktil dacrisaay dudda luk kaa soolis;dohri ayro kelitta waktik xabba haanamaay barti dite edde makitta waktî fanah (Dohri Salaataay Qasriiy Magrib kee Qishä Salat kinnuk), subci salat soolis kiraate edde ayxeerak, diggah subci salat barti malaykaa kee laqö malayka edde marta salat kinni, is ittal ciggiilak.
